include.description: Include files matching the given pattern(s), which are anchored to the root of the project.

exclude.description: Exclude files matching the given pattern(s), which are anchored to the root of the project.

global-include.description: Include files matching the given pattern(s) anywhere in the project.

global-exclude.description: Exclude files matching the given pattern(s) anywhere in the project.

recursive-include.description: Include all files matching the given pattern(s) under the given directory pattern.

recursive-exclude.description: Exclude all files matching the given pattern(s) under the given directory pattern.

graft.description: Include all files under the given directory pattern.

prune.description: Exclude all files under the given directory pattern.

default.description: An opinionated templated based on opinionated package layout.
